title: A Night in the Dirty Glove
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about 23 over rated brands that are all hype, the plot of Ghostbusters 2, the first robbery of a Brinks truck, and more! 

Have something interesting you'd like to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com, or leave us a voice message at speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
--
Go to magicspoon.com/TEXT to grab a custom bundle of cereal! And be sure to use our promo code TEXT at checkout to save five dollars off your order.
